message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase now, you can secure this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $800 compared to the regular price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
